purpose: To provide a framework for developing and simulating large-scale agent-based models that facilitate scientific research and analysis.
principle: Built on the principles of agent-based modeling, AgentTorch enables the creation of complex simulations where individual agents interact within a defined environment, allowing for emergent behaviors and insights.
reusability: AgentTorch is designed to be modular and extensible, allowing users to reuse components and integrate their own models easily.
limitations: As an alpha project, AgentTorch may have stability issues, limited documentation, and incomplete features that could affect its usability in production environments.
name: AgentTorch
